name: Soul X Soul
description:
Global Game Jam 2018 : Transmission 

Soul X Soul
(Co-op / Local Multi-Player)


Two lazy and sleepy grim who has a special condition to live, they both can only survive in one time.  Survive at night with a special skill such as move fast and powerful as same as another one who can survive in the daytime.  The punishment that given by their boss is to fulfill the soul totem. They have to cooperate with a friend to survive day and night.  The special time will come between day and night, it's call dawn.  In dawn time, they both can live powerfully and get bonus score.

Controls

Joystick/Gamepad  

  • Joystick: to Move
  • A: to Attack
  • X: to Transfer Soul
  • B: to Call Help

Keyboard

P1 :

  • WASD : to move 
  • Z : to Attack
  • X : to Transfer Soul
  • C : to Call Help 

 P2 :

  • ↑←↓→ : to move 
  • K : to Attack
  • L : to Transfer Soul 
  • J : to Call Help
